subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Despite great expectations, the elite racing series never managed to make the greatest racetrack in the United States the home of its U.S. Grand Prix.
snippet: Despite great expectations, the elite racing series never managed to make the greatest racetrack in the United States the home of its U.S. Grand Prix.
